weka.classifiers.functions

Interface GMLVQ.MethodSettings

  • Enclosing class:
    GMLVQ

    public static interface GMLVQ.MethodSettings
    The interface provides all default values and options essential for the method in general.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static double DEFAULT_LEARN_RATE_CHANGE 
      static boolean DEFAULT_MATRIX_LEARNING
      the default boolean if mode is GMLVQ (true) or GLVQ (false)
      static int DEFAULT_OMEGA_DIMENSION
      the default dimension of matrix omega
      static double DEFAULT_OMEGA_LEARNING_RATE
      the default learning rate of the omega matrix
      static boolean DEFAULT_PARALLEL_EXECUTION
      true iff GMLVQ shoud be executed in parallel.

      the default prototype learning rate
